contact_name: Eurostat, the statistical office of the European Union
description: The indicator provided is GERD (Gross domestic expenditure on R) as a percentage of GDP. "Research and experimental development (R) comprise creative work undertaken on a systematic basis in order to increase the stock of knowledge, including knowledge of man, culture and society and the use of this stock of knowledge to devise new applications" (Frascati Manual, 2002 edition, § 63 ). R is an activity where there are significant transfers of resources between units, organisations and sectors and it is important to trace the flow of R funds.
title: Gross domestic expenditure on R&D
name: qBR3e8ZgyS2nnVqhslg
contact_address: Joseph Bech building, 5 Rue Alphonse Weicker, L-2721 Luxembourg

<rdf:Description rdf:about="http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/product?code=tsiir020">     <dcat:distribution rdf:nodeID="A3"/>     <dct:description xml:lang="en">The indicator provided is GERD (Gross domestic expenditure on R) as a percentage of GDP. "Research and experimental development (R) comprise creative work undertaken on a systematic basis in order to increase the stock of knowledge, including knowledge of man, culture and society and the use of this stock of knowledge to devise new applications" (Frascati Manual, 2002 edition, § 63 ). R is an activity where there are significant transfers of resources between units, organisations and sectors and it is important to trace the flow of R funds.</dct:description>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="fr">Dépense de recherche CE</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en">Research budget</ecodp:keyword>     <dct:description xml:lang="fr">L'indicateur fourni est GERD (Gross domestic expenditure on R&D) en pourcentage du PIB. "La recherche et le développement expérimental (R&D) englobent les travaux de création entrepris de façon systématique en vue d'accroître la somme des connaissances, y compris la connaissance de l'homme, de la culture et de la société, ainsi que l'utilisation de cette somme de connaissances pour de nouvelles applications" (Manuel de Frascati, édition 2002, § 63). Les activités de R&D se caractérisent par des transferts massifs de ressources entre unités, organisations et secteurs qu'il est important d'observer.</dct:description>     <dct:modified>2012-06-18</dct:modified>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="de">Research and intellectual property</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en">Research and intellectual property</ecodp:keyword>     <dct:temporal rdf:nodeID="A4"/>     <dct:identifier>tsiir020</dct:identifier>     <ecodp:datasetType rdf:resource="http://open-data.europa.eu/kos/dataset-type/Statistical"/>     <dct:publisher rdf:resource="http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/corporate-body/ESTAT"/>     <dct:license rdf:resource="http://open-data.europa.eu/kos/licence/EuroStat"/>     <ecodp:isDocumentedBy rdf:nodeID="A2"/>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="de">Forschungsetat</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:datasetStatus rdf:resource="http://open-data.europa.eu/kos/dataset-status/Completed"/>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="fr">Finances publiques et politique budgétaire</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="fr">Budget</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en">Budget</ecodp:keyword>     <dcat:distribution rdf:nodeID="A0"/>     <dct:title xml:lang="fr">Dépense intérieure brute de R&D</dct:title>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="fr">Budget de la recherche</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:contactPoint rdf:resource="http://ec.europa.eu/dgs/information_society"/>     <dct:title xml:lang="de">Bruttoinlandsausgaben für FuE</dct:title>     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Dataset"/>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="de">Haushaltsplan</ecodp:keyword>     <dcat:distribution rdf:nodeID="A1"/>     <dct:description xml:lang="de">Der vorliegende Indikator ist GERD (Gross domestic expenditure on R) als Prozentanteil des BIP. "Forschung und Entwicklung (FuE) beinhalten eine kreative Tätigkeit auf einer systematischen Basis, mit dem Ziel, neue Kenntnisse - einschließlich Menschen-, Landes- und Gesellschaftskunde - zu gewinnen, sowie den Kenntnisbestand für neue Anwendungen zu nutzen" (Frascati Manual, 2002 edition, § 63). FuE ist eine Tätigkeit, in der wichtige Transfers zwischen Einheiten, Organisationen und Sektoren stattfinden; dabei ist es wichtig, FuE-Fonds zu verfolgen.</dct:description>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="de">EG-Forschungsausgabe</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en">EC research expenditure</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="fr">Recherche et propriété intellectuelle</ecodp:keyword>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="de">Öffentliche Finanzen und Haushaltspolitik</ecodp:keyword>     <dct:title xml:lang="en">Gross domestic expenditure on R&D</dct:title>     <ecodp:keyword xml:lang="en">Public finance and budget policy</ecodp:keyword>   </rdf:Description>   <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://open-data.europa.eu/kos/licence/EuroStat">     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#Concept"/>   </rdf:Description>   <rdf:Description rdf:nodeID="A4">     <ecodp:periodEnd>2010</ecodp:periodEnd>     <ecodp:periodStart>1990</ecodp:periodStart>     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://purl.org/dc/terms/PeriodOfTime"/>   </rdf:Description>   <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://open-data.europa.eu/kos/documentation-type/RelatedWebPage">     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#Concept"/>   </rdf:Description> <dcat:Catalog xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/#" xmlns:ecodp="http://open-data.europa.eu/ontologies/ec-odp#" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/#" rdf:about="http://open-data.europa.eu/"><dcat:record><dcat:CatalogRecord rdf:about="http://open-data.europa.eu/data/dataset/qBR3e8ZgyS2nnVqhslg"><foaf:primaryTopic>http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/product?code=tsiir020</foaf:primaryTopic><dct:modified>2012-12-12T14:04:23.152023</dct:modified><dct:issued>2012-12-12T14:04:23.152023</dct:issued></dcat:CatalogRecord></dcat:record></dcat:Catalog></rdf:RDF>
